tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE feedback_evaluations (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    student_id UUID,
    course_id UUID,
    feedback_text TEXT,
    rating INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE Evaluation (
  evaluation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  student_id INT,
  course_id INT,
  rating INT,
  comments TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE feedback_table (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    student_id INT,
    course_id INT,
    feedback_text TEXT,
    evaluation_score INT
);

CREATE TABLE feedback (
    feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    student_id INT,
    course_id INT,
    feedback_text TEXT,
    rating FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE evaluations (
    evaluation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    student_id INT,
    course_id INT,
    evaluation_text TEXT,
    rating FLOAT
);
CREATE TABLE Course (course_id INT PRIMARY KEY, course_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, description TEXT, course_duration INT);
CREATE TABLE Student (student_id INT PRIMARY KEY, full_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(255) UNIQUE, enrollment_date DATE);

CREATE TABLE Feedback (feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY, student_id INT, course_id INT, rating INT, comment TEXT, feedback_date DATE, FOREIGN KEY (student_id) REFERENCES Student(student_id), FOREIGN KEY (course_id) REFERENCES Course(course_id));
CREATE TABLE EvaluationCriteria (criteria_id INT PRIMARY KEY, criteria_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, weightage DECIMAL(5,2) NOT NULL);

CREATE TABLE EvaluationResult (result_id INT PRIMARY KEY, student_id INT, criteria_id INT, score DECIMAL(5,2), evaluation_date DATE, FOREIGN KEY (student_id) REFERENCES Student(student_id), FOREIGN KEY (criteria_id) REFERENCES EvaluationCriteria(criteria_id));
